resources.string:
Feel like having a stroll? 
 Want to try hiking in the morning? 
 Want to see your strengths after a non-active period? 
 But have no one in the same situation.
Tailor age preferences, fitness level, approximate pace, length and duration, time and space, type (stroll, hike, jogging...)

"After an early retirement I all the sudden found that none of my friends got time for walks in the park in the middle of weekdays. With this service I found a person in similar situation, and now we're training for a marathon! " \n - Margo, 56 years

Email: walkwithme@andoidapp.com 
 Phone: +35850 1234 567 
 Address: Sunset road 12, 
 123 45 Stockholm
